Deprecated Interfaces
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPathListener
          use MotionPathListener 
com.jme3.video.Clock
           
com.jme3.network.events.ConnectionListener
          Use ConnectionListener instead. 
com.jme3.network.sync.EntityFactory
           
com.jme3.network.events.MessageListener
          Use MessageListener instead. 
com.jme3.network.sync.SyncEntity
           
 

Deprecated Classes
com.jme3.video.plugins.jheora.ADecoder
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath
          use MotionPath 
com.jme3.video.plugins.jheora.AVThread
           
com.jme3.network.connection.Client
          Use Client from Network instead. 
com.jme3.network.sync.ClientSyncService
           
com.jme3.network.sync.EntitySyncInfo
           
com.jme3.network.message.Message
          Message implementations should extend instead or use the for referencing. 
com.jme3.network.sync.MovingAverage
           
com.jme3.video.RingBuffer
           
com.jme3.network.connection.Server
          Use Server from Network instead. 
com.jme3.network.sync.ServerSyncService
           
com.jme3.app.SimpleBulletApplication
          in favor of using BulletAppState:
stateManager.attach(new BulletAppState()); 
com.jme3.collision.SweepSphere
           
com.jme3.network.sync.SyncMessage

Deprecated Enums
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.Direction
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.PathInterpolation
           
com.jme3.cinematic.MotionPath.PathInterpolation
          replaced by com.jme3.scene.shape.Spline.SplineType 
 

Deprecated Annotation Types
com.jme3.network.sync.Sync
           
 

Deprecated Fields
com.jme3.math.Transform.Identity
          To follow with the standard for constants, which should be all upper case. Use Transform.IDENTITY instead. 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.jme3.math.Matrix3f.add(Matrix3f)
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.addListener(AnimationPathListener)
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.addWayPoint(Vector3f)
           
com.jme3.bullet.collision.PhysicsCollisionObject.attachDebugShape(AssetManager)
          in favor of PhysicsSpace.enableDebug(AssetManager manager); 
com.jme3.bullet.collision.PhysicsCollisionObject.attachDebugShape(Material)
          in favor of PhysicsSpace.enableDebug(AssetManager manager); 
com.jme3.scene.Node.childChange(Geometry, int, int)
          Dead code 
com.jme3.material.Material.clearTextureParam(String)
          use clearParam instead 
com.jme3.audio.AudioNode.clearUpdateNeeded()
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.cloneForSpatial(Spatial)
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.disableDebugShape()
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.enableDebugShape(AssetManager, Node)
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimControl.getAttachmentsNode(String)
          use SkeletonControl.getAttachementNode instead. 
com.jme3.network.message.Message.getClient()
          This method always returns null in the new API. 
com.jme3.network.message.Message.getConnection()
          This method always returns null in the new API. 
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.getCurveTension()
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.getDirectionType()
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.getDuration()
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.getLength()
           
com.jme3.input.ChaseCamera.getMaxHeight()
          use getMaxVerticalRotation() 
com.jme3.input.ChaseCamera.getMinHeight()
          use getMinVerticalRotation() 
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.getNbWayPoints()
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.getPathInterpolation()
           
com.jme3.cinematic.MotionPath.getPathInterpolation()
          use getPathSplineType return the type of path interpolation for this path 
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.getRotation()
           
com.jme3.effect.ParticleEmitter.getStartVel()
          Use ParticleEmitter.getInitialVelocity() 
com.jme3.animation.AnimControl.getTargets()
          use SkeletonControl.getTargets() instead get the SkeletonControl doing spatial.getControl(SkeletonControl.class); 
com.jme3.texture.Texture.getTextureKey()
          Use Texture.getKey() 
com.jme3.effect.ParticleEmitter.getVariation()
          Use ParticleEmitter.getVelocityVariation() 
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.getWayPoint(int)
           
com.jme3.collision.CollisionResult.getWorldContactPoint()
          Use getContactPoint() instead, its already in world space. 
com.jme3.app.state.AbstractAppState.isActive()
           
com.jme3.cinematic.Cinematic.isActive()
           
com.jme3.bullet.BulletAppState.isActive()

com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.pause()
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.play()
           
com.jme3.network.serializing.Serializer.registerPackage(String)
          This cannot be implemented in a reasonable way that works in all deployment methods.

com.jme3.cinematic.Cinematic.setActive(boolean)
           
com.jme3.bullet.BulletAppState.setActive(boolean)

com.jme3.network.message.Message.setConnection(Connection)
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.setCurveTension(float)
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.setCycle(boolean)
           
com.jme3.bullet.PhysicsSpace.setDeterministic(boolean)
          in favor of PhysicsSpace.setMaxSubSteps 
com.jme3.renderer.Camera.setDirection(Vector3f)
          Manipulate the quaternion rotation instead: Camera.setRotation(com.jme3.math.Quaternion). 
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.setDirectionType(AnimationPath.Direction)
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.setDuration(float)
           
com.jme3.post.FilterPostProcessor.setFilterEnabled(Filter, boolean)
          use filter.setEnabled(boolean enabled) instead 
com.jme3.input.ChaseCamera.setInvertYaxis(boolean)
          use setInvertVerticalAxis 
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.setLookAt(Vector3f, Vector3f)
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.setLoop(boolean)
           
com.jme3.input.ChaseCamera.setMaxHeight(float)
          use setMaxVerticalRotation() 
com.jme3.input.ChaseCamera.setMinHeight(float)
          use setMinVerticalRotation() 
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.setPathInterpolation(AnimationPath.PathInterpolation)
           
com.jme3.cinematic.MotionPath.setPathInterpolation(MotionPath.PathInterpolation)
          use setPathSplineType instead sets the path interpolation for this path 
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.setRotation(Quaternion)
           
com.jme3.effect.ParticleEmitter.setStartVel(Vector3f)
          Use ParticleEmitter.setInitialVelocity(com.jme3.math.Vector3f) 
com.jme3.texture.Texture.setTextureKey(TextureKey)
          Use Texture.setKey(com.jme3.asset.AssetKey) 
com.jme3.scene.Mesh.setTriangleCount(int)
          Use Mesh.updateCounts() to update the counts after updating the buffers. 
com.jme3.effect.ParticleEmitter.setVariation(float)
          Use ParticleEmitter#setVelocityVariation()  
com.jme3.scene.Mesh.setVertexCount(int)
          Use Mesh.updateCounts() to update the counts after updating the buffers. 
com.jme3.font.BitmapText.setWordWrap(boolean)
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath.stop()
           
 

Deprecated Constructors
com.jme3.scene.control.AbstractControl(Spatial)
          The spatial parameter is passed in AbstractControl.setSpatial(com.jme3.scene.Spatial) automatically. 
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath()
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimationPath(Spatial)
           
com.jme3.animation.AnimControl(Node, Mesh[], Skeleton)
          AnimControl doesnt' hande the skinning anymore, use AnimControl(Skeleton skeleton); Then create a SkeletonControl(Node model, Mesh[] meshes, Skeleton skeleton); and add it to the spatial. 
com.jme3.scene.CameraNode(Camera)
          Use the constructors that take a name 
com.jme3.scene.CameraNode(CameraControl)
          Use the constructors that take a name 
com.jme3.network.connection.Client()
          Call createClient() on Network instead. 
com.jme3.network.connection.Client(String, int, int)
          Call connectToServer() on Network instead. 
com.jme3.asset.DesktopAssetManager(boolean)
           
com.jme3.scene.control.LodControl(Geometry)
          Use LodControl.LodControl() 
com.jme3.network.connection.Server(int, int)
          Call createServer() on Network instead. 
 

Deprecated Enum Constants
com.jme3.shader.UniformBinding.AmbientLightColor
           
com.jme3.bullet.BulletAppState.ThreadingType.DETACHED
          since native bullet will be parallelized at the time physics is moved to native 
com.jme3.scene.VertexBuffer.Type.MiscAttrib
